alert.description_short: Displays an alert dialog with a message to the user.

align.description_short: Sets alignment of content within the element.
align.example:
Left aligned
Center aligned
Right aligned

bgcolor.description_short: Sets the background color of the element.
bgcolor.example: This div has a light blue background

bgimage.description_short: Sets the background image of the element.

border.description_short: Sets the border of the element.
border.example: This div has a black border

boxshadow.description_short: Applies a shadow effect to the element.
boxshadow.example: This div has a shadow

click.description_short: Executes an action or expression when the element is clicked.

cursor.description_short: Sets the cursor when hovering over the element.
cursor.example: Default Pointer Text Move Wait Crosshair Not Allowed Help Progress Grab Grabbing Cell Copy Alias Zoom In Zoom Out Col Resize Row Resize N Resize S Resize E Resize W Resize NE Resize NW Resize SE Resize SW Resize

flex.description_short: Sets flex properties for the element.

flexitem.description_short: Sets properties of a flex item.

font.example: This text uses a custom font

height.description_short: Sets the height of the element.

hrefhost.description_short: Sets the base URL based on host match.

ifafterbegin.description_short: Conditional insertion after beginning of element.

ifbeforeend.description_short: Conditional insertion before end of element.

insertbeforebegin.description_short: Inserts new content immediately before the element.

insertafterbegin.description_short: Inserts new content just inside the element, before its first child.

insertbeforeend.description_short: Inserts new content just inside the element, after its last child.

insertafterend.description_short: Inserts new content immediately after the element.

justifycontent.description_short: Aligns flex items along the main axis.

lineheight.description_short: Sets the height of text lines.

lowercase.example: THIS TEXT WILL APPEAR IN LOWERCASE LETTERS

onclicked.description_short: Triggered when the element is clicked.
onclicked.example: <button click="sethtml:[Button clicked!]" onclicked="insertbeforeend:[ Added after]">Click me</button>

onenabled.description_short: Triggered when the element or feature becomes enabled.

ondisabled.description_short: Triggered when the element or feature becomes disabled.

onfocused.description_short: Triggered when the element gains focus.

onblur.description_short: Triggered when the element loses focus.

onhide.description_short: Triggered when the element is hidden.

onshow.description_short: Triggered when the element is shown.
onshow.example: Hidden Panel

onsubmitted.description_short: Triggered when a form is submitted.

onload.description_short: Triggered when the element is loaded.

resize.description_short: Sets resize behavior of the element.
resize.example:
<textarea resize="both" width="200px" height="100px">You can resize me</textarea>
<textarea resize="none" width="200px" height="100px">You cannot resize me</textarea>

resetvalue.description_short: Resets the value of the element.

runorder.description_short: Runs attributes in the specified order inside the element.

setaction.description_short: Sets or changes the action URL of a form.

setmax.description_short: Sets the maximum value of a progress bar or input range element.

sethref.description_short: Sets the href attribute of the element.

setvalue.description_short: Sets the value of the element.

setid.description_short: Sets the id of the element.

setname.description_short: Sets the name of the element.

setsrc.description_short: Sets the source of the image.

togglevalue.description_short: Toggles the value of the element.

trimleft.description_short: Removes characters from the start of content.

trimright.description_short: Removes characters from the end of content.

uppercase.example: This text will appear in uppercase letters

width.description_short: Sets the width of the element.

wordbreak.description_short: Sets how words break in text.
wordbreak.example:
Thisisaverylongwordthatmayoverflow.
Thisisaverylongwordthatmayoverflow.
This is a long sentence that will not break words in CJK text.

whitespace.example:
This text has normal whitespace.
This text preserves all spaces and line breaks.
This text will not wrap onto the next line, even if it overflows.

zindex.description_short: Sets the stacking order of the element.
zindex.example: On top Behind

zoom.description_short: Sets zoom scale of the element.
zoom.example: This text is zoomed in by 150%
